00049     /////////////////////////////////////////
00050     // TypedConstraint Functions
00051 
00052     TypedConstraint::TypedConstraint ()
00053     {
00054     }
00055 
00056     TypedConstraint::TypedConstraint (ActorRigid* bodya, ActorRigid* bodyb)
00057     {
00058         ActorA=bodya;
00059         ActorB=bodyb;
00060         BodyA=bodya->physrigidbody;
00061         BodyB=bodyb->physrigidbody;
00062         ConstraintBase=NULL;
00063     }
00064 
00065     TypedConstraint::TypedConstraint (ActorRigid* bodya)
00066     {
00067         ActorA=bodya;
00068         ActorB=NULL;
00069         BodyA=bodya->physrigidbody;
00070         BodyB=NULL;
00071         ConstraintBase=NULL;
00072     }
00073 
00074     TypedConstraint::~TypedConstraint ()
00075     {
00076     }
00077 
00078     ActorRigid* TypedConstraint::GetActorA()
00079     {
00080         return ActorA;
00081     }
00082 
00083     ActorRigid* TypedConstraint::GetActorB()
00084     {
00085         return ActorB;
00086     }
00087

00089     // ConeTwist Constraint Functions
00090 
00091     ConeTwistConstraint::ConeTwistConstraint (ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA,
00092                                               Vector3 VectorB, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB) : TypedConstraint (ActorA, ActorB)
00093     {
00094         btTransform transa(QuaternionA.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorA.GetBulletVector3());
00095         btTransform transb(QuaternionB.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorB.GetBulletVector3());
00096         ConeTwist = new btConeTwistConstraint (*BodyA, *BodyB, transa, transb);
00097         ConstraintBase = ConeTwist;
00098     }
00099 
00100     ConeTwistConstraint::ConeTwistConstraint (ActorRigid* ActorA, Vector3 VectorA, Quaternion QuaternionA) : TypedConstraint (ActorA)
00101     {
00102         btTransform transa(QuaternionA.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorA.GetBulletVector3());
00103         ConeTwist = new btConeTwistConstraint (*BodyA, transa);
00104         ConstraintBase = ConeTwist;
00105     }
00106 
00107     ConeTwistConstraint::ConeTwistConstraint (btConeTwistConstraint* Constraint)
00108     {
00109         ConeTwist = Constraint;
00110         ConstraintBase = Constraint;
00111     }
00112 
00113     ConeTwistConstraint::~ConeTwistConstraint ()
00114     {
00115         delete ConeTwist;
00116     }
00117 
00118     void ConeTwistConstraint::SetAngularOnly (bool AngularOnly)
00119     {
00120         this->ConeTwist->setAngularOnly(AngularOnly);
00121     }

00125         this->ConeTwist->setLimit(LimitIndex, LimitValue);
00126     }

00130     {
00131         this->ConeTwist->setLimit(SwingSpan1, SwingSpan2, Twistspan, Softness, BiasFactor, RelaxationFactor);
00132     }

00333     HingeConstraint::HingeConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 PivotInA, Vector3 PivotInB, Vector3 AxisInA, Vector3 AxisInB, bool UseReferenceA) : TypedConstraint (ActorA, ActorB)
00334     {
00335         btVector3 tempA(AxisInA.GetBulletVector3());
00336         btVector3 tempB(AxisInB.GetBulletVector3());
00337         Hinge = new btHingeConstraint(*BodyA, *BodyB, PivotInA.GetBulletVector3(), PivotInB.GetBulletVector3(), tempA, tempB, bool(UseReferenceA));
00338         ConstraintBase = Hinge;
00339     }
00340 
00341     HingeConstraint::HingeConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, Vector3 PivotInA, Vector3 AxisInA, bool UseReferenceA) : TypedConstraint (ActorA)
00342     {
00343         btVector3 tempA(AxisInA.GetBulletVector3());
00344         Hinge = new btHingeConstraint(*BodyA, PivotInA.GetBulletVector3(), tempA, bool(UseReferenceA));
00345         ConstraintBase = Hinge;
00346     }
00347 
00348     HingeConstraint::HingeConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA, Vector3 VectorB, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB, bool UseReferenceA) : TypedConstraint (ActorA, ActorB)
00349     {
00350         btTransform transa(QuaternionA.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorA.GetBulletVector3());
00351         btTransform transb(QuaternionB.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorB.GetBulletVector3());
00352         Hinge = new btHingeConstraint(*BodyA, *BodyB, transa, transb, UseReferenceA);
00353         ConstraintBase = Hinge;
00354     }

00436     Hinge2Constraint::Hinge2Constraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 Anchor, Vector3 Axis1, Vector3 Axis2) : Generic6DofSpringConstraint(ActorA, ActorB)
00437     {
00438         btVector3 temp1(Anchor.GetBulletVector3());
00439         btVector3 temp2(Axis1.GetBulletVector3());
00440         btVector3 temp3(Axis2.GetBulletVector3());
00441         Hinge2 = new btHinge2Constraint(*BodyA, *BodyB, temp1, temp2, temp3);
00442         Generic6dofSpring = Hinge2;
00443         Generic6dof = Hinge2;
00444         ConstraintBase = Hinge2;
00445     }
00446 
00447     Hinge2Constraint::Hinge2Constraint(btHinge2Constraint* Constraint)
00448     {
00449         Hinge2 = Constraint;
00450         Generic6dofSpring = Constraint;
00451         Generic6dof = Constraint;
00452         ConstraintBase = Constraint;
00453     }
00454

00456     {
00457         delete Hinge2;

00541     SliderConstraint::SliderConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 VectorA, Vector3 VectorB, Quaternion QuaternionA, Quaternion QuaternionB, bool UseLinearReferenceA) : TypedConstraint(ActorA, ActorB)
00542     {
00543         btTransform transa(QuaternionA.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorA.GetBulletVector3());
00544         btTransform transb(QuaternionB.GetBulletQuaternion(), VectorB.GetBulletVector3());
00545         Slider = new btSliderConstraint(*BodyA, *BodyB, transa, transb, UseLinearReferenceA);
00546         ConstraintBase = Slider;
00547     }

00552         Slider = new btSliderConstraint(*BodyA, transb, UseLinearReferenceA);
00553         ConstraintBase = Slider;

00732     /////////////////////////////////////////
00733     // Universal Constraint Functions
00734 
00735     UniversalConstraint::UniversalConstraint(ActorRigid* ActorA, ActorRigid* ActorB, Vector3 Anchor, Vector3 Axis1, Vector3 Axis2) : Generic6DofConstraint(ActorA, ActorB)
00736     {
00737         btVector3 temp1(Anchor.GetBulletVector3());
00738         btVector3 temp2(Axis1.GetBulletVector3());
00739         btVector3 temp3(Axis2.GetBulletVector3());
00740         Universal = new btUniversalConstraint(*BodyA, *BodyB, temp1, temp2, temp3);
00741         Generic6dof = Universal;
00742         ConstraintBase = Universal;
00743     }
00744 
00745     UniversalConstraint::UniversalConstraint(btUniversalConstraint* Constraint)
00746     {
00747         Universal = Constraint;
00748         Generic6dof = Constraint;
00749         ConstraintBase = Constraint;
00750     }
00751 
00752     UniversalConstraint::~UniversalConstraint()
00753     {
00754         delete Universal;
00755     }
00756 
00757     void UniversalConstraint::SetUpperLimit(Real Ang1Max, Real Ang2Max)
00758     {
00759         this->Universal->setUpperLimit(Ang1Max, Ang2Max);
00760     }
00761 
00762     void UniversalConstraint::SetLowerLimit(Real Ang1Min, Real Ang2Min)
00763     {
00764         this->Universal->setLowerLimit(Ang1Min, Ang2Min);
00765     }
